name: Sarthak Srivastava
tagline: Aerospace Engineer. Performance Athlete. Learning Machine.
body:
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/472635171712163840/bWdP0e94.jpeg)
## About Me
Presently working with [Rolls-Royce@NTU Corporate Lab](http://rrntucorplab.ntu.edu.sg/Research/Pages/mrt-.aspx) on optimizing Vibratory Finishing of Jet Engine components.
Interested in Engineering Design, Physical Sciences and Scientific Computation.
Besides solving equations, I enjoy devouring books, pushing my body to its limits and drumming along to rock music.  

## Projects
You may use the below links to follow my projects. I design my projects/ goals to enable holistic physical and intellectual development for myself. The underlying belief is always to wake up stronger and smarter every morning.   

## What I follow
A compendium of pages/ links which keep me informed and motivated. 

## Reach Me
I would love to hear from you. Tell me something funny/witty/interesting. Hit me up for coffee. Ask me to travel/ do business with you. 
*[Twitter](www.twitter.com/@aerostark1)
*[Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/32096396-sarthak)
